se.lth.cs.pt.window

Class SimpleWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lth.cs.pt.window.SimpleWindow

  • public class SimpleWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple window to draw in, used in "Objektorienterad programmering och Java".
